name: YouTube classic - Dark Gray Theme
description: Dark gray theme for YouTube classic (pre-Polymer design) for those who miss having a dark mode.
additional_info:
Warning: This style is only for the old design! Also, it's still a work in progress, so don't expect everything to be properly styled. The old design can temporarily be enabled by appending "?disable_polymer=1" to the URL, for example https://www.youtube.com/?disable_polymer=1. That gets annoying though so install a userscript add-on like Tampermonkey (for Chrome or Firefox) and use one of these scripts:
  • - https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/34818-youtube-restore-classic (this is what I use)
  • - https://cable.ayra.ch/tampermonkey/view.php?script=youtube_old_design.user.js
If you're on Firefox you can also use an extension:
  • - https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/youtube-classic
If you're on Chrome, search the Chrome Store, but you may not find anything because Google tends to delete these kinds of extensions. Yet another alternative, is to modify your useragent string to an old version of Firefox such as "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:41.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/41.0"
